polyrun.sampler

Interface Sampler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HitAndRun

    public interface Sampler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[][] sample(double[][] A, double[] b, boolean homogeneous, double[] startPoint, int numberOfSamples)
      Samples from convex polytope defined by linear inequalities A x ≤ b.

    • Method Detail

      • sample

        double[][] sample(double[][] A,
                  double[] b,
                  boolean homogeneous,
                  double[] startPoint,
                  int numberOfSamples)
        Samples from convex polytope defined by linear inequalities A x ≤ b.

        Note: A x ≤ b is expected to be consistent and full-dimensional system of inequalities.

        Parameters:
        A - lhs coefficients
        b - rhs coefficients
        homogeneous - whether provided system is in homogeneous coordinates
        startPoint - start point
        numberOfSamples - number of samples
        Returns:
        samples
